title: Root Account Usage Detected
description: Identifies any activity performed by the AWS Root account. The Root account should be secured and only used for specific account management tasks (e.g., billing, support plan changes). Routine usage indicates a serious security risk.
author: Antigravity
false_positives: AWS Support plan changes (look for eventSource: support.amazonaws.com)
recommendation: Investigate immediately. Determine who has the root credentials. Secure the account with MFA and use IAM roles for daily tasks.
